channel.title: Need help on my server!
channel.description:
hello, ive recently been trying 2 start my own moparscape server ip. ive been having a few problems lately, if any1 can help id be glad 2 make u a staff or admin ( your chose, admins r gonna be 200k rs cash so ur getin a good deal.. ). k here is my prob. ( just updated i got a new source.. ) :D
ok i have no-ip, and so the smily face is blushin mm'k? and i clicked on compile and let the thing load, then exited out of it, then pressed runserver, and i left that up there, oped moparscape, and then typed in the no-ip, and it worked, but now i cant get other people 2 connect 2 it.... :confused: :confused:

item.title: Need help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @medal_star90 medal_star90
item.description:
@medal_star90 wrote:

pretty much he says go to www.portforward.com simple just click it… now if you know what a route is to connect you to your internet find it and on it should be its make and year and click the one that matchs…after that forward yuo port to 43954

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @hobojo hobojo
item.description:
@hobojo wrote:

dang this is realllllly confusing me ( im not that smart… ) so like if there is a vid or clip u can show me THADA BE GR8!

item.title: Need help on my server!

item.description:
@ownzor wrote:

portforward.com is the best site

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

ur dumb nelement360, no1 “needs” his compiler, your problem is that you have a router. go to www.portforward.com and find the make and model of your router, then click the button by where it says “i dont see my program on the list” and for the port your putting forward, put in 43594 =] there u go

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

port forward?also btw dont sell admin/mod mod spots or even mention it!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @nelement360 nelement360
item.description:
@nelement360 wrote:

u probably need mods Mod Taharok’s 'Perfect Compiler to compi;e things right and maybe you didnt enter you ip right into no-ip.com…or dont use “no-ip” and just go onto command and enter “ipconfig”

hopes this helps

Read full topic
